Reviews.Title: “good stopover at a good price”
Reviews.Author: james_bethel
Reviews.Content: stopped over having arrived in the evening from Healthrow before driving down to Seville day after - total party of 5 with a 3 year old included. The hotel went out of its way to allocate a triple and double room adjacent to each other for us. The roomd were very clean and well equipped and incredibly good value compared to UK hotels - staff were courteous and friendly and I would recommend this hotel for anyone on their way in or out of Madrid Barajas airport

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: KB_loves_holidays
Reviews.Content: I have just returned from a long weekend break in Madrid with two friends and stayed at the hotel Nuevo Boston. Our stay was great, the hotel is modern and clean, rooms are spacious, the breakfast was superb and the pool was a lovely extra to escape the city heat. The only minor issues we had was that the noise from the restaurant at night (between 10pm-midnight) was quite loud and kept us awake. Also, as great as the shuttle from the hotel to the city was, we were a little annoyed on our last day when the bus went without us despite booking it the day before. There was barely an apology and no alternative but to pay for a taxi into the city. Taxi prices were always around the 20 Euro mark which we considered quite good between three of us. All in all, a great stay in beautiful Madrid.

Reviews.Title: “"Fantastic"”
Reviews.Author: claire r
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and i have just returned from a 4 night break at the Nuevo Boston and we had a excellent experience there. The hotel was really modern, the rooms were really nice, spacious and were serviced everyday. The hotel offers a free shuttle into the centre of madrid 3 times a day during Aug, this was a really pleasant surprise as the centre is about 30 mins away on public transport. The hotel staff were very helpful and friendly. The hotel is really well air conditioned and the bar offered really reasonable prices, another very pleasant surprise. It has a cyber area with computers linked to internet. The Pool was great, really clean, a lifeguard on site and towels were provided. The commute from the airport is 10 mins, again the hotel shuttle is available to pick you up. The hotel is located near a busy road however you wouldnt know it as the rooms are soundproofed,there is a large shopping mall about 10 mins away with a huge food court meant we could eat out of the hotel in the days we decided not to go into Madrid. All in all we had a great time, we wanted a quiet break away and thats exactly what we got. Couldnt think of anything negative to say about this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel, great value”
Reviews.Author: Ali945
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for three nights a few months ago. The rooms were very clean, tidy, spacious and very modern. The overall atmosphere of this hotel was just fantastic. The hotel bar was reasonably priced, not like most other hotels that charge ridiculous prices. We had dinner there twice and it was very nice food. The staff were helpful and friendly, all spoke English. The best part about this hotel was the free shuttle service to/from airport/city centre. When we arrived at the airport, the shuttle service arrived within 10min of me calling - great first impression! Because the location of this hotel is further out of the city, the shuttle service was very handy to have to go into central. You can choose what time to be dropped off/picked up and book a slot. There is a bus stop nearby but we didn't make use of public transport much. Overall a fantastic stay.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderfull stay”
Reviews.Author: Baroudeur69
Reviews.Content: The shuttle service is very efficient . i arrived at the airport at 8 :30 am . i call the reception and they send me immediatly the shuttle service. the hotel is very close from the airport 5min . When i arrived at the hotel they found me a room at 9 am .I was very happy to had an early C/I.The swimming pool is very good especially with the very hot weather in madrid .it's good to refresh after a long day.Price in the restaurent and the bar are very cheap . The hotel is very clean , room are spacious and comfortable .Staff are very professional, friendly .Thanx you to Diego the waiter of restaurant .He was very polite ,helpfull and friendly. The only thing i will complain it's that the hotel is very far from the city center and is complicate to join the subway.u have to walk five minutes to catch a bus .then 20 minute of bus to go the metro station of Avenida de America, but otherwise my stay in the hotel estaba estupendo .

Reviews.Title: “great hotel close to the airport”
Reviews.Author: azzzure
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel my last night in Europe before returning home. I had flown into Madrid that evening. I used the pay phone in the airport to call the hotel to have the shuttle pick me up. The person who answered the phone spoke English and I soon found that all the front desk representatives did as well. The hotel was close to the airport. The shuttle ran every hour to the airport the next morning. The rooms were very spacious, looked new and clean. I wish I had time to use the pool but I arrived too late. I instead walked to the shopping mall closeby to do some last minute shopping. Great place!

Reviews.Title: “excellent!”
Reviews.Author: EmelSkopje
Reviews.Content: Surprisingly good, rooms very spacious and clean, comfortable beds, a very nice outdoor area with a small pool but very well maintained and an excellent garden bar! the staff very helpful ( the only drawback is that like everywhere in Madrid you will seldom find someone who can communicate in English) . The hotel is close to the airport, they do run a shuttle to and from the airport as well as weekend shuttles to the city. The cab fare to get to the city is more or less about 20 euros!

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly Good”
Reviews.Content: Excellent shuttle bus service to and from the airport. Compact but nice pool and adjoining "chill out" area is actually very relaxing and they serve a fantastic gin and tonic. Staff very friendly and accomodating. Much much more than just a standard "airport hotel"....highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Stayed here at both the start and end of our trip...”
Reviews.Author: TheAdventuringNinja
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I (both in our early to mid twenties) stayed here at the beginning and end of our trip around Spain. I've listed the pros and cons below, but let me say we really appreciated the closeness to the airport when we were leaving, and after staying in some places with uncomfortable beds, really appreciated the facilities here! The only real disappointment was the inconvenience of getting into the city itself, thought they do offer a shuttle. PROS: Many of the staff members at Husa Nuevo Boston speak English, and some speak other common European languages. They were very helpful with getting us to and from the airport, into the city on the weekends, and giving us guidance with the buses when they did not offer shuttle services. When you arrive at the airport they will come pick you up as soon as you have landed and call them. When getting a ride to the airport, the shuttle leaves hourly from the hotel. They have a nice pool and outdoor lounge area, which is nice for families. Free WifFi is great. On weekends they offer a shuttle into the city at different times so you don't have to take the bus, but if you do need to use public transport the day (and even night buses) are only a block and a half away. They let us check in early, and the room was great! Comfy bed, and very clean. Despite being close to the airport, we never heard planes....though we did hear the soft clinking of dishes sometimes, regardless of the distance between our room and the dining area. Not distracting, but weird! CONS: If you want something close to the airport, Husa Nuevo Boston is great, but it's inconvenient for getting into the city. Madrid's normal metro/bus pass does not cover the zone the hotel falls into (barely), so every time you want to go into the city, you have to pay €2 each way! The night bus costs €3.50 (also one-way). TIP: When heading to or from to the hotel, the easiest way is to take the bus to/from Avenida de America. When coming back home, get off at the first stop after the big roundabout/Canillejas. There aren't really any restaurants in the area (I think I noticed an English pub a few blocks away when we were taking the shuttle into town once) and the hotel's dining options were a bit on the pricey side for my boyfriend and I. Also, as great as the room was, they have the stiffest toilet paper--almost like small paper towels. Just seemed kind of odd since everything else was great. I recommend signing up for your weekend shuttle times early before they fill up, and you should note that they do not offer a laundry service and we found no public laundromats in Madrid.

Reviews.Title: “A perfect transit hotel...”
Reviews.Author: Roro-de-Bab
Reviews.Content: Good sized and clean rooms. It is a perfect transit hotel since the shuttle service from the airport is very effective but bewares to book sufficiently early for the morning return to the airport since the van is rapidly complete. If you have a car, parking on road seem to be safe since it is a business area. Terminal 1 of Barajas airport is about 5 mn drive and is easy to find that makes this hotel interesting to who has to overnight and return the car rent before flight early in the morning..

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: jamesie51
Reviews.Content: Clean, modern, friendly! Massive shopping center only 10 mins away. We are just leaving the hotel now but are returning twice more on the return journey!

Reviews.Title: “Trip Advisor Rating Has Gone to Its Head”
Reviews.Author: jgodey
Reviews.Content: Air conditioner didn't work night we were there, manager first said we were working system wrong then later admitted it was not working in entire hotel. We got no sleep and I asked manager for refund - he said he would check with his boss and get back to me. Never heard from them. We always go by TripAdvisor ratings, but as finding a troubling trend where some of the higher rated hotels seem to be resting on their laurels. The temperature in our room was 85 degrees at 3 a.m. - at a minimum the Hotel could have apologized.

Reviews.Title: “Nice new hotel”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: This is a nice new hotel near the airport. It's clean and the service is acceptable. The service in the restaurant is nicer than at reception. My room was fine except that the air-conditioning seemed to stop working at some point in the night, and I couldn't make it work again. This made the room very hot, and I couldn't sleep. Overall however, this is a good hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very good stay.”
Reviews.Author: Emile S
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very nice. Price for room was very reasonnable. Hotel shuttle was on time and fast. Room was kind of small but acceptable. Very clean and comfortable. Minibar in the room. No english channels on TV. the bathroom was very clean and has all necessary amenities. The pool was amazing, very cool and perfect temperature. Huge shopping mall next to hotel (5 mins walking).

Reviews.Title: “Fine Business Hotel with Extras”
Reviews.Author: jsaylor18
Reviews.Content: We had to stay overnight by the airport before catching our plane to the States, and we could not have been happier with our choice. The hotel van picked us up within 10 minutes (though they told us it could take as much as 45 because there is only one van, and the airport is huge). The hotel is immaculate, modern, and very well designed. The room is large by European standards, with unusually high ceilings that give a sense of space. Good king size bed. The bathroom may have been the best ever with a cool bidet with cover, large powerful shower, and all marble. The dining room offered a good, moderately priced buffet (no restaurants close enough to walk to). Pleasant staff, most of guests well dressed business-men.

Reviews.Title: “Free shuttle to the airport”
Reviews.Author: GaryEBOTS
Reviews.Content: I chose this hotel specifically because they had a free shuttle to the airport. It turns out that they are also a 10 minute walk from a shopping mall which is handy in case you want to pick up any last minute items. The room was very clean and the bath products were brand name quality. The only downside was that the dinner offering was a buffet. As there was no restaurants close by, this was a little disappointing but not enough to spoil my stay.

Reviews.Title: “Good basic Quality to Price hotel, but all extra's are paid (like Ryanair)”
Reviews.Author: Jan T
Reviews.Content: The basic room price is imho very good value for money. Very good 4**** room with good size, minibar, safe and proper equipped bathroom. Close to the airport and free shuttle (but only running 1 x per hour) and in the weekend also free shuttle to the city centre. As I was only for 22 hours in Madrid as there was no proper connection on the same day for my travelplan (Marrakech-Madid-Dublin) I only used the hotel as a 'stop-over' place to sleep and het through the day: arrived there around 2100, had a quick drink in the garden and a snack in the restaurant and then enjoyed a good sleep in the hotelroom. The next day did pay for the breakfast which offered a proper buffet style breakfast: although I would have like the opportunity to order once eggs as you like them and then made fresh to order: but we only had (hard) fried eggs or scrambled with undercooked bacon: but apart frm that good buffet. (If you can get a deal with breakfast included it's worth it, but also paying for it gave reasonable value for money). My only complaint is the "Ryanair style": BF not included was for the deal I booked (also offers that included BF were available), but also WiFi internet access was payable, internet-access via the TV in the room was payable at 12,50 per day: and I didn't even check for the costs of movies or adult movies. Imho a different selection of the 30 "free" TV channels would have been nice: the news channels are fine (BBC World, Al Jazeera [en + arabic], CNN, CNBC and France24 (french and english). But an English language "non news" station would have been nice (and drop a German or Spanish channel). As check-out was at noon I hung around in my room till then and then moved to the pool where I enjoyed the sun and water + some drinks in the garden next to the pool till 1600 when I took the shuttle to the airport. The hotel is good value for money for both business traveler as well as private stay for city trip etc. The Hilton (Madrid Airport) is more or less on the other side of the street and costs aprox 4 x as much for one extra * : unless you are not paying yourself, I'd go for Nuevo Boston.

Reviews.Title: “Great value in Madrid”
Reviews.Author: ILovePassportStamps
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very clean and bright and is excellent value for money. We stayed on a room only basis and didnt have the buffet breakfast so I can't comment on that. It did seem expensive though. the room was bright and airy and the beds were comfortable. The hotel shuttle from the airport collected us minutes after we called. We also used their free shuttle into the city however got a taxi back both evenings as there is no bus back to the hotel between 2045 and 0045. It is still a great service. There is a large mall less than ten minutes walk away. One small criticism is that you cannot eat by the pool and on the second day we had to eat inside as there was no terrace service.

Reviews.Title: “Welcoming bright place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Dani1949
Reviews.Content: The Husa Nueva Boston is a clean, bright welcoming place to stay. The beds are great and the tub is deep and wonderful after a long trip. The shuttle to the airport is on time and excellent. There is a big mall with lots of restaurants a ten minute walk away.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, Modern, Good Value, close to Airport”
Reviews.Author: Tropics_in_Winter
Reviews.Content: We took a taxi there from Barajas Airport, but if you have a phone they will pick you up. Can also arrange for transport to airport on hotel van, which runs once per hour on the hour. Sign up for transport to airport in advance. Taxi fare from airport is about 26 Euros and taxi to Puerto del Sol from airport is about 20 Euros. The difference is due to airport tax and baggage, I think. Free wireless, get password at desk on arrival. The only criticism I would have of this hotel is that on Saturdays, Sundays and Holidays, breakfast does not start until 8am, otherwise 7am. Since we wanted to catch the 8am shuttle, we did not experience the breakfast. For an airport hotel, it seemed more to the employees benefit than the clients to have this late start on weekends. Anyway, it was very inconvenient for us, and is the reason we gave it only 4 stars. I guess the other thing to say is that it is next to the freeway near the airport, so it is just for sleeping, but that was what we wanted, a nice place to crash near the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Business trip to Madrid - commerce center”
Reviews.Author: Patrick P
Reviews.Content: Travelers opting for this hotel have a need to be close to the airport or to the business center situated very near to Barajas airport. After landing we (four colleagues) contacted reception and were picked up within a couple of minutes by the hotel shuttle bus. Receptionists were professional and handled check-in and -out quickly and friendly. Rooms are comfortable, modern, clean and spacious. Breakfast was delicious with a lot of choice which pleased me a lot! To get to center of the city you can take the public bus at less then 10 minutes walking or the Metro green line (line 5) with direct connection to other lines and which bring you to the center in less then 30 minutes. I recommend the hotel for its comfort and vicinity to the airport but also with the possibility to visit the center of Madrid after business obligations!

Reviews.Title: “Nice room friendly receptionist”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Nice and modern room. Nice receptionist upon arrival. Checkout was slow, only one member of staff behind the desk.

Reviews.Title: “Great rates, clean, modern, friendly hotel”
Reviews.Author: GladtoGoRose
Reviews.Content: This hotel is perfect for anyone wanting to be close to business area or the Barajas airport. They provided shuttle service from the airport to the hotel and the driver was very friendly. Unfortunately, I don't speak Spanish, but my companion does. The front desk staff were very helpful and spoke enough English to get me registered very efficiently, set the time for my shuttle in the morning, and arrange my wake up call. During the writing of this, there was a knock on the door, it was housekeeping with chocolates and the offer to turn down my bed. Room is large by European standards and spotless. I definitely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Rates, Great Rooms!”
Reviews.Author: jrferreras100
Reviews.Content: If you need to go to IFEMA Exhibition Halls or simply an Airport overnight in Madrid's Barajas Airport, this is the best option, great rates, beautiful rooms and includes free wi-fi Internet with complimentary airport transfers. If staying during the weekend, it includes complimentary shuttle for Central Madrid on a round-trip basis with 4 schedule departing times in the morning/midday and 4 returns in the afternoon/evening!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent experience !!”
Reviews.Author: Martunia1984
Reviews.Content: OMG, we got this hotel at pretty low rate and we did not know what to expect - but it was awesome. Clean, comfortable, close to the airport with shuttle services. Staff was extremely nice and helpful (if you need to find out about locations with visiting with not too many tourists they will let you know) During weekend they have shuttle service to the city center as well (the last one around 1am which is great). There is also bus stop right by the hotel that runs to different sections of Madrid. We could not ask for more.

Reviews.Title: “FOOD AT HOTEL IS MAKING PEOPLE SICK”
Reviews.Author: firemanlover
Reviews.Content: And the management doesn't care!!! The hotel is very nice. BUT do NOT eat there.We ate at the buffet at the restaurant. My husband and I became violently ill. Our one night in the hotel became a sleepless night of running for the bathroom to vomit or have diarrhea. The next morning when checking out we were told by Roberto at the front desk that it didn't matter that the hotel food made us sick he was still going to charge us for the meals. He also told us he received other complaints fro hotel guests who became ill after eating at the buffet. The hotel is lovely but we won't be back and shame on the hotel policy that doesn't care if their guests are food poisoned by the chef!

Reviews.Title: “free shuttle for early morning departure from Madrid Airport”
Reviews.Author: j t
Reviews.Content: Chosen for its proximity to the airport and its free shuttle service the hotel Nuevo Boston did not disappoint. Our interior room was quiet and dark, of a nice size and with good bathroom amenities. The restaurant was surprisingly good for one serving basically a captive audience. Free shuttle was booked for 4am, and departed on time. A good cup of coffee was even available before hand. If you need a place to stay for a night near the airport, this is a good one -- and a great value.

Reviews.Title: “Ok for a night before flying”
Reviews.Author: mbaker04
Reviews.Content: I stayed here because it was convenient to the airport and free shuttle was offered. I booked two nights as my daughter was staying on an extra day in Madrid. There was no box of tissues in the room. Normally I wouldn't think it's a big deal (although a 4 star hotel...hmmm should provide tissues) However, I was reeeallly sick with a bad cold. Nevertheless, I called the front desk and asked for some tissues. Quickly I was brought a teeny weeny pack that was the size of 1/8 of a travel pack of kleenex! I called back and explained how sick I was and that I needed a box and was told that those individual packs were all that they had but they would bring me more. ( I am fluent in Spanish, so no language barrier here) Quickly, one more tiny package arrived! I was not happy. The next morning I arrived downstairs at 7:55 as I was told. (Shuttle service only runs once an hour to the airport) They had no clue in the morning that I had booked it the night before, but did get me there with no problem. By the way, someone wrote a review that the shuttle would take you to city center etc.; however, when I asked if they would shuttle me to the shopping mall down the road (because it was raining), which is a ten minute walk, and a 2 minute drive, they would not do it. The following day I was awakened by my daughter at 6 am US time (after traveling home 16 hours). She had a splitting headache. I told her to just pick up the phone and ask the hotel to give her some asprin, iburpofen, tylenol etc. Every hotel has a first aid kit. My daughter told me not only would they not provide any, but they were not nice about it either. When my daughter checked out of the hotel, I was again disturbed be her having to call me (at my expense) because they gave her a hassle. I had given them my Amex (which they required at check-in and also signed for my stay). Their front desk people are incompetent. Oh, which reminds me. When we checked in we were given the key to "our" room. After traveling all day and looking forward to plopping down for a minute on the bed, we opened the door only to be greeted by a man screaming at us, followed by a lady in her thong running to lock the door again behind us! Ooopsie, they gave us keys to an occupied room. The reception not warm, the service was not hospitable, the employees not particularly pleasant, and I did not enjoy this hotel. It was however, a clean and comfortable place to stay by the airport as long as you don't need tissues.

Reviews.Title: “Near the airport, shuttle service, breakfast”
Reviews.Author: gearheart
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel because it was near the airport and had a shuttle service. You should know that you have to call them to pick you up at the airport - they don't just make rounds like some hotels do. Also, you must tell the desk (the night before) that you will need a shuttle TO the airport. We rode the Airport Express bus from Madrid to the airport and then called the shuttle. No problem. And a lot less expensive than a taxi. The hotel is very nice. Very modern, slightly quirky (but in a good way). They have a restaurant but it's expensive. Breakfast starts at 7:30, which is good. Our room was clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly and helpful. We would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and new!”
Reviews.Author: PumpkinPie1984
Reviews.Content: I'm here for business travel and only stayed one night. I did not expect anything as I thought all of the hotels close to airport were pretty much the same. But this hotel with such price is good! Room is spacious, free wifi in the entire hotel, it's just nice and new! Definitely coming back! Oh but there's one small drawback... Early in the morning you might hear dishes clases clicking as the staff getting breakfast ready on the ground floor. I was staying on the 3th floor but still could hear it. Nevertheless that did not bother me.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly Staff!”
Reviews.Author: ajmartinezp
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure about this hotel as I read some good and not so good reviews, nevertheless I decided to give it a try. The hotel staff is very friendly, honestly I wasn't really expecting much as I know there are some cultural differences between Spain and Latin America. The hotels has a nice atmosphere that enables you to get some rest, they run transportation (complimentary) to downtown during the weekends which makes it very convenient to do sightseeing during your stay. I would definitively come back any time and stay there again. One recommendation, if you want to buy water or sodas walk to the mall and buy them at the supermarket, way cheaper and more selection. To go there, get out of the hotel, take your left and walk all the way, at the end of the street (a long one) take left and the mall will be on your right. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent 4 star hotel @ Premier Inn prices”
Reviews.Author: lennster1975
Reviews.Content: I stayed here in June with my girlfirend . I initially chose the hotel as it had good reviews and was close to the airport and included a free shuttle service to and from the airport . We arrived at the Airport and phoned the hotel and withing 15 minutes the shuttle bus turned up I was immediatly impressed by the professional service offered and considering how intimidating Madrid airport can be if you've never been there before. It was very late at night and check in went very smoothly . Our room was very spacious , modern and clean the bathroom was very modern too , although the door to the abthroom did not shut properly i classed this as a very minor issue in the scheme of things and would not be deterred. It was quiet the stay and most enjoyable . The following morning we took advantage of the free shuttle that travels at set times down into Madrid City centre , this again was very punctual and I could not fault ,Madrid is a lovely city with plenty to do. We also spent some time at the hotels pool which is very nice and secluded however it did feel like in the afternoon when some business guests who had paid for the extra service that we were not welcome at the pool. We had an evening meal at the hotel and althought the food was good the service could have been a bit better . Having said those last couple of things I found the whole experience excellent value for money and definitely had the quality feel , I would return again and for this reason I maintain the 5 star rating for this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for overnight near airport!”
Reviews.Author: Pikas
Reviews.Content: It's an excelent hotel to go on business. Excelent for overnight (or more, it has a pool!!!) near Barajas MAD airport, as it is 5min travel, and they offer free shuttle transfer. It's about 1 mile away from a big shopping center, it's walkable and besides it helps get in shape ;) Metro station is far away, not walkable. Seems there is a bus near by. At weekends, hotel provides free shuttle to city center. It's a good hotel for those who want to be near the airport, and are not interested in going very often to Madrid (city). Design of the hotel is 5*, staff also, it has a restaurant (20€ for all inclusive meal, i guess). It has open air space with chill out zone, near the pool. Rooms are excelent, 5*, with interactive TV / net. Price: 53€/night, no breakfast. Perfect.

Reviews.Title: “LOVE LOVE LOVED IT”
Reviews.Author: naz h
Reviews.Content: A friend and I booked very last min a cheap bank holiday break. absolulty 5* good service, great room, good food, amazing weather, gorgeous pool area, lovely staff. Really close to the shopping centre, also free mini cab straight from airport to the hotel and then free mini cab into central madrid. I have already booked to go back there next with my sister. If your going to madrid for a break THIS IS THE PLACE TO STAY :)

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel but buffet meal not good value with young children”
Reviews.Author: CarolineET
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed in this hotel for one night before flying home to the UK. It was very good - the rooms were extremely spacious and spotless and the staff very friendly and helpful. The only negative point I would make is that the breakfast buffet was 11 euros per person which is fine if you are an adult but there didn't seem to be any provision for a small child to eat at a reduced price and so it proved rather a costly one piece of toast! That aside I would certainly use this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Mrjid1301
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at Hotel Neuvo Boston about a week ago to see my sister who was studying abroad in Oviedo. I must say I was very skepticel to sty in a hotel in Europe that I wasnt a member of some sort of awards program with....especially one tht is in a warehouse district, boy was I wrong. The hotel is small, boutique like and beautiful. The lobby was awesome, the rooms were clean and very pretty. Once I realized how to work the lights in the room by using my room key in the slot near the door. Some of the staff had a bit of attitudes especially those at the front desk and the shuttle drivers. they truly need to work on their attitudes because that is a major turn-off to make a guest wanna extend a stay ot return to the hotel in the future. The food is alittle pricey for my taste and was just ok...nothing spectacular. Overall it was a great place too stay a night or two if you can ignore attitudes from staff...I couldnt ignore it so I didnt extend my stay as I needed too.

Reviews.Title: “Decent airport hotel with good rooms but not much in the area.”
Reviews.Author: Mikenmar22000
Reviews.Content: The hotel has a modern style decor and appears fairly newly renovated. The rooms were nice and checkout was smooth. They did make an error in scheduling our shuttle in the morning which was easily fixed. Not much else in the arae however. If you book here, plan on eating at the hotel, swimming at the pool and spending most of your time there. That, or plan on using taxis to go out of the area.

Reviews.Title: “A very average experience...”
Reviews.Author: agab50
Reviews.Content: We found the waiting staff to be really welcoming and accommodating and they provided us with excellent service. The food was good but we had the same choice of 3-4 dishes for the whole week, fine if you are staying for a night or two but not so good if you are staying any longer. It also took a while for the food to be brought out, over 45 mins between courses and sometimes it was cold. The room was clean and tidy. The front desk staff did not seem to be very customer focussed, something that has been said on here before. They really do not know how to handle their clients with the care that they should. There was a congress on when we were there, so every evening a notice went up that there was a private function 'tonight' and guests could not sit by the pool in the evening. Not great at the height of the summer and perhaps better to put up a sign that the pool area was not available to guests all week. I eventually managed to get a late check out until 3pm which took several discussions and some negotiation. It is a very difficult hotel to find, even the 'Tom Tom' failed and we heard stories of people going round in circles for hours (from a staff member). Don't pay for parking in the hotel as, firstly, it is extortionate and, more importantly, you can park on the street for free. All in all, an average hotel that needs to be more client centric. Personally, I will not be returning.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel but shame about the restaurant”
Reviews.Author: klr9576
Reviews.Content: A group of 13 of us stayed here for a hen weekend. The hotel is beautifully designed with spacious rooms and extremley comfortable beds. A cab into the city is just around 17 euros so a great base to escape the hustle of the city. The staff were all very helpful too. The only thing I would complain is the restaurant, the breakfast buffet is fantastic but we ate at lunch time and the service was very slow and the food cold and of poor quality as well as expensive, we had the 3 course meal for €20 on the first night which was also very poor and the waiter failed to tell us that the free drink included was water or wine even though we had asked if it was any drink. However when we got the bill and complained to reception they did refund us 50% and admitted to lots of complaints about the food. The only additional extras that would be nice for a hotel of this standard would of been robes in the rooms and more sun loungers but with cushions on.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel but poor customer service”
Reviews.Author: Viajeroojuelense
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints about the hotel which is in a good shape and well located. However, some of the staff members at the front desk have a poor customer service attitude. Instead of being willing to help, they were treating badly different hosts. A better attitude from them, would make the experience more pleasant. I would recommend this hotel provided that front desk employees become more customer friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Modern, convenient, cheap, wi-fi by the pool... Yes!”
Reviews.Author: trotamundoscansada
Reviews.Content: I just arrived and this hotel is everything that everyone on Trip Advisor said that it would be and more. The pool and pool area is beautiful. The rooms are spacious, comfy, very clean and modern. The Wi-Fi is free and available all over the hotel... including at the pool :) The location is great, if you are basing your Madrid stay around the airport. There is a free hotel shuttle to/from the airport which is only about 6 mins away.

Reviews.Title: “Great place, in the middle of nowhere”
Reviews.Author: Joe_Osborne
Reviews.Content: If you're taking a vacation to Madrid, this is probably not the best place for you. If you're on a layover for a day from the airport, this would be perfect for you. The bad: other than a huge mall about 15 minutes walk from the hotel, there is nothing around. It's in an industrial area right off the highway. Even the nearest metro station is at least 20 minutes walk. There is a bus stop nearby, but figuring out the bus routes is quite difficult. The breakfast buffet was 18 Euros, way too expensive. The view from our window was a terrible construction site. The good: free shuttle to the airport every hour, and they'll pick you up from the airport if you call the hotel. They also have a shuttle to the city center on the weekends for free as well. The room decor was amazing, modern and comfortable. The staff was all very friendly and accommodating. They speak English, and the TV had a few English channels. Free WiFi in the rooms. For the quality of the hotel, it's priced at a great value. But if you're looking to explore the city of Madrid, stay closer to the city center.

Reviews.Title: “Good choice near the airport”
Reviews.Author: ready29
Reviews.Content: We had to stay one night before an early morning flight out of Madrid. Clean, convenient and suitable

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: jls1320
Reviews.Content: Only a ten minute ride from the airport. Reliable and punctual shuttle service. We called from the airport, the staff said 15 minutes and it was 15 minutes. The driver helped with our bags and the baby stroller and brought the bags to our room for us. We asked for a crib, it was delivered within ten minutes. The crib came with cute little sheets and a pillow and they provided little amenities for the baby. The staff was extremely professional and hospitable. No task was too tough for them. The hotel has a modern, bright decor. The rooms are decent sized, comfy beds and great pillows and linens. The room also has a refrigerator. They offer a free shuttle on weekends to the City Centre. They offer 24 hour room service. The restaurant had great food. Menu is a little small, however. The amenities were great and nothing was missing. We highly recommend this hotel and look forward to staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Husa Nuevo Boston is my new Madrid Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: MDDad
Reviews.Content: I have been forced to travel to Spain for work, and traveling out of the Madrid airport has been a struggle. Most of the airport hotels are not very good, and the elite properties (see prior reviews) often try to take advantage of American travelers. I found the Hotel Husa Nuevo Boston on TripAdvisor and another website, and I am pleased to finally have a hotel for travel in and out of Madrid. The Hotel Husa Nuevo Boston is located 1.8km from the airport near many of the other airport hotels. As has been noted in other reviews, there is very little in the area, but this is true of all of the airport properties. The entire hotel is very clean, and my room was very comfortable. There is free wireless internet, and computers are available for those without a laptop. Unlike other properties, the staff at this hotel were extremely professional. Even though I speak some Spanish, the hotel staff spoke to me in English since they knew I was from the United States. The hotel restaurant was surprisingly good and very reasonable considering guests are almost forced to eat there. A 3 course meal with an appetizer, main dish, dessert, drink, and coffee was less than 20 euros. Guests should know that you must call the hotel on arrival to get picked up at the airport. This is easy to do, but you must use a pay phone since hotel airport phone connections are not available in the Madrid airport. If you forget the phone number, it can be obtained very easily from the visitor information desk at the airport. In summary, this is a perfect hotel if you are looking for an overnight place to stay when traveling to or from the Madrid airport. The location is the only drawback, but I will be staying at the Hotel Husa Nuevo Boston again.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: Berrycm
Reviews.Content: Spotlessly clean. Very welcoming at check in. Room comfortable and bright. Excellent buffet. Great value overall. Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “No shuttle bus to be seen”
Reviews.Author: kellyabra
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very modern. The rooms are spacious and clean. I do not have one complaint with that aspect of the hotel. However, where they failed is in regards to the primary reason why people book airport hotels: Efficient transport to and from the airport. 1) At the airport, there were no courtesy phones to contact the hotel. I needed to go make change at the nearest restaurant so that I can use a public phone. 2) The hotel clerk told me that a shuttle bus would pass by in 15-20 minutes to pick us up. After 50 minutes, still no shuttle bus. When I called again to ask what was going on, they told me that the bus had passed by and did not see anyone and so returned to the hotel. And that I should wait another 15-20 minutes for the shuttle bus to come back. Obviously this was a lie, because 30 seconds after I hang up the phone, the shuttle bus was there!!! So for that reason, I will never go back to this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for proximity to the airport, clean, good value, free shuttle!”
Reviews.Author: mkharr2
Reviews.Content: We stayed here Saturday night to catch an early flight out of Madrid Sunday morning. It was a great experience, the rooms are clean and modern with large bathrooms, the free shuttle was on time, the staff was polite very helpful. On the weekends you can schedule a free shuttle into the city center, and a pick up from the city center which was very helpful to us, as we wanted to see a few of the Madrid sights before leaving the next morning. Great hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice!”
Reviews.Author: ROBnVA
Reviews.Content: Just want to ditto the excellent reviews. Efficient free shuttle made things much easier. On the weekends, the restaurant does not open for breakfast until 8:00 am. Our rate included breakfast but we had an 8:00 am shuttle reserved to the airport. No problem the pleasant front desk receptionist said. She had boxed breakfasts ready for us upon check out the next morning. Also, the restaurant does not start serving dinner until 8:30 pm (at least on the weekends) but if you want to eat something earlier without leaving the hotel (it was raining), the bar serves a soup, salad, sandwich menu. The burger and fries were quite tastey!

Reviews.Title: “Good stopover hotel”
Reviews.Author: lat28
Reviews.Content: For the price, a very good value. We had a large room/bathroom, large bed as well. Shuttle was timely and free, free wireless helped with check-in for flights. Only issue was the somewhat weak AC with cheap controls - would have preferred to open the window (we did upon arrival) because it was cooler outside, but we were given a room facing the freeway.

Reviews.Title: “Great new hotel near the airport”
Reviews.Author: lugo_06
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located near Barajas airport. Free hotel shuttle picked us up from the airport (we had to call the hotel from the airport for pick-up). We signed up at the front desk for free shuttle to take us to the airport in a morning. The hotel is new, built only two years ago. It has stark modern interior design and is very spacious. Our room and bathroom were really large and very clean and comfortable. There is temperature control inside the room and the windows are soundproof. People at the reception speak very good English and are friendly and helpful. There is a big shopping mall in about 15 min walking distance from the hotel. The mall has numerous dining options on the 3rd level. The hotel is a good value for staying near the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Best value for money ever!”
Reviews.Author: Marcel_Guadalupe
Reviews.Content: We have stayed in many hotels around the world, but this one had best quality for money. The staff goes all the way to help you enjoying your stay, they even provide a scale to weigh your luggage, before going to the airport. Don't forget about the huge shopping center, just a 15 minute walk away.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay while exploring Madrid”
Reviews.Author: TwoLove2Travel
Reviews.Content: We called the hotel as soon as we arrived at the airport in Madrid (as directed). The friendly staff informed us where the shuttle bus would pick us up and within 15-20 minutes we were at the hotel. Clean, comfortable, quiet and user friendly are the words to describe the room. The staff helped us with maps and directions. A shopping mall and the city bus stop is within walking distance. The buffet breakfast is good and is included in the room price as well as free internet and shuttle to and from the airport. We would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice & New, near the Airport (terminals 1,2&3)”
Reviews.Author: MadrileÃ±a
Reviews.Content: I had to go for a training course in this hotel and for team building purposes I had to spend the night in it (even though I live 5 km away!!) Anyway, this hotel is new, so beds are really confortable, bathroom's done out in marble, and it's modern and nice, great shower. TV actually works. Breakfast is good, plenty of hot food, cold meats, cereals, pastries, toasts, fresh fruit, coffee and tea. Or you can have just a coffee and cookies for 2.50 euros. Afternoon meal & dinner available and nice too. The only thing I would strongly recommend when cheking-in is to ask the receptionist to place you in a room away from the "balcony or area" overlooking the breakfast/dinning area as they start work at 6.30 in the morning and the noise will go on until 01:00 hr at night, and you'll be able to hear the plates, chat, etc, from your room. Not very nice. The hotel has a shuttle service too. Make sure you book it at reception with plenty of time. Overall, it's a good place for business, not so much for turism, as it's well away from city centre and turisty area.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel near the airport”
Reviews.Author: IntlEconTraveler
Reviews.Content: The value you get for your money is amazing. The hotel offers free shuttle service to and from the airport. The rooms are spacious, clean and well organized. The bathrooms are large and full of great amenities. It feels like a modern five star inside. I didn't use any of the facilities inside so I cannot comment on the quality of the food, etc. etc. However for overnight travel i believe its superb.

Reviews.Title: “Close to airport, for a lay over, good price and rotten restaurant.”
Reviews.Author: darkstar388
Reviews.Content: Shuttle service slow. Room clean, nice beds, but was hot even though it was chilly outside. Reserved through Am. Airlines and got a great price. Far from restaurants, so almost forced to eat in the hotel, prices were expensive and food wasn't good.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel Near Madrid Airport”
Reviews.Author: jpearsontraveler
Reviews.Content: Heading home to the U.S. after a 3 week trip to Spain, we stayed at Hotel Nuevo Boston near the Madrid airport. This ultra-modern hotel was a great find. The staff was very friendly, the room was spacious and spotlessly clean, and we enjoyed a late dinner and breakfast buffet at the hotel restaurant. A definite plus was the free shuttle to the airport. For the price this was a great value and we would definitely stay there again on our next trip to Spain.

Reviews.Title: “From the outside you wouldn't believe what a beautiful hotel it is.”
Reviews.Author: lindyjkh
Reviews.Content: This hotel was about 15 minutes from the airport in a business location. However the inside was just lovely. Very modern, Asian design. Wonderful breakfast buffet included. Room was quiet, fairly large, and the beds were very comfortable. It took a 25 euro taxi ride to the main part of Madrid, but we were prepared for that, as we only had a one night stay as a stopover from Italy to the US. We still can't believe that we paid only $65 American dollars. Granted the taxi ride to and from the center of town made up for it, but as we had a flight out the next morning, it was worth it. Were we to have planned on several days for sightseeing, it probably wouldn't have been worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Wish this was closer to city center”
Reviews.Author: Kelley317
Reviews.Content: This hotel was the best during our week trip to Europe. We selected it because it was close to the airport. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone. The shuttle picked us up from the airport and took us back in the morning. It was easy! The room was spacious and cozy. Wish we could have spent longer there than other hotels. The staff was very helpful!

Reviews.Title: “rip off”
Reviews.Author: barbestabrooks
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel because it offers a free shuttle to the airport. However, they do not say subject to availability! When we tried reserve the shuttle on check-in they said sorry, it was full. They offered nothing else and told us to take a taxi. It cost us another 25 Euros to get to the airport. We were furious with the deception.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for late or early flight”
Reviews.Author: shoelover009
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for my first night in Madrid as the flight was not due to arrive until 10pm. I was glad I did as the flight was delayed and I landed at midnight. The shuttle from the airport was a small people carrier which was very comfortable and airconditioned, it arrived quickly and the trip to the hotel took about 10 minutes. The room was big, airconditioned and spotless. The bed was huge. The bathroom was also large with a nice supply of toilettries. The shower was hot although not particularly powerful. After my disasterous stay on the second night in Madrid in a hotel in central madrid I decided to stay here again on my last day in Madrid as I had an early flight. Made my own way to the airport on the metro and the shuttle picked me up and took me back in the morning. Also had a meal in the restaurant - a steak - whcih was lovely and very reasonably priced. The rooms were a bargain at €57 per night and I would definitley stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “The shuttle bus and staff are superb”
Reviews.Author: Poppaea
Reviews.Content: Perfect airport hotel! On arrival at Madrid airport we rang Hotel Nuevo Boston and they told us where to wait for the free shuttle bus to the hotel (we waited around 20 minutes). First impressions were that the hotel was well decorated and our room was spacious, clean and comfortable. In the evening we wanted to explore central Madrid, so we took the free shuttle bus to Avenida de las Americas and then got the metro into the centre (think this is only offered at the weekends). The following morning we took the shuttle back to the airport. However, we had to leave before breakfast was served, so they very kindly provided us with breakfast boxes! Worked really well for us – we were able to do everything we wanted to do, but probably for half the price of a centrally located hotel. On arrival pre-book the shuttle bus rides to avoid disappointment.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!”
Reviews.Author: lazzarox
Reviews.Content: One of the best hotel we spent night in. We came by chance the first time, and we came back to rest a few days after our trip. Free shuttle service to the airport (as most of the hotels there) and to the city centre. Excellent value per money (we had a special last minute). Great great service, hospitality. Breakfast is endless. Free WiFi internet is definately a plus.

Reviews.Title: “Can't believe this is an airport hotel”
Reviews.Author: hovan
Reviews.Content: Hotel is very modern, super clean and tastefully decorated. Rooms are very big, very bright and airy, extremely clean and not at all what you would expect from an airport hotel. There was free wifi in the rooms. Staff were very friendly and helpful (a first for an airport hotel?) Great value for money. Only thing to note is that the shuttle doesn't run constantly in loops to the airport. You have to book the shuttle, and it generally runs on the hour. One night we tried to book the shuttle from the airport after returning our car, but were told that it was already full, and we had to wait another hour for it's next loop. We ended up taking a cab, which cost 20Euro from Terminal 4. Terminal 4 is approximately 15 min drive away, and Terminals 1-3 are slightly closer, maybe 10min.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Airport Location”
Reviews.Author: LindasColorado
Reviews.Content: We stayed here one night mainly because it was close to the airport for our next day departure. The hotel has a shuttle to the airport that took us less than 15 minutes. This hotel was an execellent place to stay. The rooms were large and immaculate. There was a fairly large outdoor pool that was clean and good shape. The hotel was exceptionally quiet, especially considering is next to the airport. There restaurant at the hotel provided a diverse menu at reasonable prices. There did not appear to be other restaurants near the hotel which may be a downside for some individuals who may be on a longer stay. But the quality of the room in our opinion would make up for this.

Reviews.Title: “What hotels should be, pity it's next to the airport...”
Reviews.Author: NzTraveller007
Reviews.Content: We booked one night in this hotel near the airport as we got in late and moved into the centre of Madrid the following day. The hotel was amazing, provided a free pick up from the airport and free shuttle into city centre the following day. Room was huge, beautifully furnished, and immaculately clean. Staff were lovely and very helpful. Unfortunately no breakfast or wi-fi, and location out of the way for all but the airport. Aside from that this was what a good hotel should be!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for stay nearby airport”
Reviews.Author: Leep_HK
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel for one night. I was looking specifically for a hotel near the airport as I had a late arrival flight. The hotel promises free shuttle to hotel, so even though I arrived at 1am and the shuttle already stopped running, the hotel told me to get a cab that was paid by them. That was great because I didn't even need to wait for the shuttle! The only problem was that my cab driver tried to cheat us by taking us through a really long, convoluted route-- the meter was up to 40 euros! As the hotel promised to pay for it, everything turned out OK but I was just a bit worried sitting in the cab not knowing what they guy intended to do-- just take us for a ride to charge us extra or kidnap and rob us! Luckily I called the hotel when I figured something was wrong (ride was suppose to be 5 mins but we still didn't arrive after 15mins) and the concierge talked to the cabbie and demanded he drive us there immediately. Anyways, despite the adventure with the cabbie, the stay itself was great. The hotel had great service. To compensate me for the cab drama, the hotel upgraded us to a bigger room. Decor was modern, room very clean. Free wifi throughout hotel as promised. Didn't try breakfast as we thought it was a bit expensive, but turns out all hotels in Spain charge you around 15 euros for breakfast. The next day, we just took the free shuttle back to the airport to access the metro from there. Didn't want to take our chances with another taxi driver again. Would definitely stay at hotel again if I have another late arrival or early departure. But otherwise would look for a hotel closer to city centre to save time on traveling.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for the airport!”
Reviews.Author: china_chick1289
Reviews.Content: I read reviews about this hotel before booking and they were all very good. The complimentary shuttle arrived 15 minutes after I called to say I'd arrived. The hotel was very clean, modern and well decorated. The pool although very small was nice and the rooms were lovely. The hotel is also only a 10 minute walk from a decent shopping centre with lots of choice of restaurants to eat if you don't feel like eating at the hotel restaurant. The hotel's location is great for the airport- only a 10 minute drive- but far away from the city centre. Also there is a large construction site next door but that wasn't really a problem; just not so nice to look at. Overall a really nice hotel that's great value for money!

Reviews.Title: “Does not meet up to the Standard at all”
Reviews.Author: scholl78
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the hotel for 2 nights. No matter who was in charge of the reception, the staff was unfriendly and as it turned out very incompetent either. The wake up Call was made one hour early and even after pciking up the phone and complainign it continued to ring every 15 minutes. There was no Remote in the room for the air conditioning, there were just no sign on the wall who showed the way to our room. After enquiring a week later about a lost item the staff told me in a very rude way to hang up and she will call me back. The only good thing about our stay was the bathroom but again, every item (Toothbrush etc.) was only available for one person. I don´t know how this hotel could get a 5 star rating with this service.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel near Madrid Barajas Airport”
Reviews.Author: PinkOrchid5
Reviews.Content: The hotel was really modern, trendy, and clean. The staff was more than nice when we called them from the airport to find out about their complimentary pick up and drop off shuttles to the airport. They picked us up quickly after that and it was about 10 minutes to the hotel. We chose this hotel because we had an early flight, but if you are going to the city center where all the tourist attractions are, you are better off staying in the city. There is a complimentary shuttle to Avenida de las Americas, but only on weekends and national holidays, and you still have to take metro to the main attractions and city center. If you were to travel to the city in metro from the airport it takes about 45mins so it would take time from your day if you wanted to see the city center. There is complimentary wireless internet and the breakfast buffet (not included in room cost) is only 12 euro and really good. The room was big and the beds were very comfortable, just like the ones we have in the US. There is also a shopping center within 10 minutes walking distance where you can eat and shop for clothes. The cost of the hotel was definitely very good when I went, less than 100 euros good! I definitely recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “GREAT hotel near Madrid Airport”
Reviews.Author: JTfromWA
Reviews.Content: We had unexpected last minute changes to our itinerary while traveling through Spain,and had to find a hotel near the Madrid airport. We chose the Nuevo Boston hotel, and what a great choice this was. The staff was outstanding! I had mistakenly left my backpack in the taxi and lost it -- the staff immediately stopped all they were doing and started making phone calls to all the taxi companies and the police. They helped to recover the backpack. The service was fantastic - including the free van rides to and from the Madrid Airport, only 5 minutes away. For the quality of hotel, the price and value was fantastic. We usually pay 2 times more for a comparable hotel. It's a new hotel, and very clean, and somewhat upscale and modern. On a return trip, we had already planned to stay at a different hotel near the airport, but due to our great experience at Nuevo Boston, we cancelled that hotel, and re-booked at the Nuevo Boston. I would highly recommend this to families, and of course business travelers who need to stay near the airport. If you need a trip into town, take their van to the airport and then the subway to downtown Madrid.

Reviews.Title: “Chic and funky hotel”
Reviews.Author: Burnzi
Reviews.Content: I have no camplaints about this hotel. I was promptly picked up at the airport by the shuttle and the driver, Cesar, was extremely polite, helpful and informative. The staff is young and I found them them to be well trained in customer hospitality. It was a pleasure to deal with them. The room was well appointed, comfortable and clean and I thought the hotel and its amenities were a good value. I liked the decor of the hotel, it was pleasantly chic and modern. I had free internet access and was able to print my boarding pass. I had a problem with the printer but Cesar promptly arrived and fixed the problem.

Reviews.Title: “great overnight stop if you have a car or airport stop”
Reviews.Author: Charlotte003
Reviews.Content: We were driving back to France and chose this hotel for the location just off the motorway. It isn't near Madrid centre but we took a taxi in for the evening and it cost 15 euros each way. We found this hotel fantastic value for money, very clean and the staff very helpful. The breakfast is really good and worth paying for. The rooms are very modern with very nice bathrooms. The pool looked very nice but had no umbrellas so we didn't sit out as it was 40 degrees! Compared to other similar rated hotels we stayed in on our journey through France/Spain this was one of the best value.

Reviews.Title: “I have never been treated so rudely!”
Reviews.Author: euphalien
Reviews.Content: After stranding us at the airport because their "complimentary shuttle" only ran till 10 AM (information left out of their Hotels.com booking page), they refused to refund us our 2-Euro bus fare without a receipt. On top of that, we were actually at the airport shuttle-stop waiting for almost an hour before 10 AM...and they never came! They did not tell us they would refund our money for transportation despite that being their "policy." Of course, the hotel never informed us of this policy while we were stuck at the airport! They said later that they would have paid up to 20 Euros for a cab, but the cabs wouldn't agree to drive us only 1 KM for less than 30 Euros, anyway. While trying to reach the hotel by phone at the airport, nobody answered! When having the airport Hotel desk call, it still took multiple calls to reach them. THEN, all they told us was that the shuttle ended at 10 and the next one was tomorrow. SO...once we finally arrived at the hotel after two bus rides and a long walk, the Hotel NEVER once APOLOGIZED for the inconvenience or misinformation. We tried multiple times to get our money--again, only 2 Euros--and perhaps an apology, but were unsuccessful. We filed an official complaint with the Board of Tourism which the Night Manager tried to swindle us out of filing by lying to us about which copies stayed in the Hotel. He also treated us like idiots, which is funny considering we caught him redhanded. The hotel may have been clean and comfortable, but the staff was so rude that I would never recommend this poorly-situated hotel!

Reviews.Title: “very chic, comfy and elegant”
Reviews.Author: maggieAlmeria
Reviews.Content: only stayed 1 night from our trip to the UK driving down from Santander and was pleasantly surprised at the style of the hotel, the staff at reception and the bar were really friendly and polite, rooms were beautiful and the beds were really comfy just what we needed as we were driving down to Almeria the next morning, Would definately use this hotel again if we were in Madrid.

Reviews.Title: “Good idea-Bad location”
Reviews.Author: Donna24
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying the hotel is brand new funky ,modem, chic accmodation. Receptionists are so lovely -and speck English .They also helped me out with my Spanish. The room itself was great- felt very clean and new (on the first day), make sure they change the sheets! I loved the bathroom-very atmospheric gorgeous spot lighting deep bath and cool accessorises. Overall, a nice romantic feel. The hotel is no where near the centre of the city, but up the road from airport- beware of the cab scam- taxies charge up to 25 Euros to drive 10 minutes up the road! (get the bus). Hotel has a nice looking swimming pool at the back- currently not in use. Apparently it will be up and running in June-so hold tight! Another point is the restaurant looks great but serves microwave food for lunch and dinner- forget about the breakfast buffet, its 12 Euros and is made up of cold meats and fruit only!!!!!!! Really not worth it. If you stay in this gorgeous hotel you will spend allot of money getting in and out the city which is about 1 hr away . Hotel Boston overall is a great hotel but only suitable for a luxury over night stay near the airport- not for a city break. Spend extra and stay in the centre of the city. PS: no internet,no phone.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice modern hotel with great beds !!”
Reviews.Author: VanDelden
Reviews.Content: Loved the hotel ! Very nice and friendly receptionist. Its not in the center but easy to reach by taxi or with the bus and metro. Rooms very new and great beds, nice swimmingpool. Would go there again when we visit the very nice city off Madrid. Only negative point is no restaurant open only cafeteria in th evening (not friendly for the guests) and no internet possibilities (only when you have your own laptop with you.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: muslimah28
Reviews.Content: This was a very nice hotel. It is very modern, very clean, very shiny, and very suave. The decor is contemporary with a great colour scheme to create a real vibe. Staff were pleasant and helpful and speak English.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Husa Nuevo Boston
HotelInfo.Address: Avda de Aragon 332, 28027 Madrid, Spain
